name: Bottom Feeder
description:
Bottom Feeder is a challenging puzzle game where snakes eat pellets, but only with their bottoms tails.

View the game's source code.

Many thanks to testsolvers for thoughtful feedback and help with difficulty calibration: Ivan Bochkov, Joel Fox, Rebecca Gruskin, Jack Kutilek, Jack Lance, Greg Price,  Skalmantas Šimenas, Matt Wright, and the Thinky Puzzle Discord community.

Resources used: PuzzleScript by Stephen Lavelle, and level selection by Alan Hazelden.
